item.description:
Sunday the 23rd will be an excellent time to leave the crush of humanity and material pursuits to others, and enjoy some free culture, and a good meal. We have a wealth of art and culture in our back yard, why not avail yourself of some? Harvard's museums are free on Sunday mornings, as is parking for most of Cambridge.

We'll meet at 11:00 AM in front of the Peabody Museum of Ethnology, just north of the Harvard yard, or in the lobby if it's cold.

After the museum, we can walk to Grendel's Den, or other restaurant, for an (inexpensive) Brunch in Harvard Square. There are often surprise events in Harvard Square, and, if not, the square is an event unto itself.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Sunday Free Harvard University Museum Visit, Followed by Brunch in the Square
